pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Parallel General-Purpose Adaptive Optimisation Engine // A general-purpose optimisation engine that supports i) Monte Carlo optimisation with Metropolis criterion [Metropolis et al. (1953) doi:10.1063/1.1699114, Hastings (1970) doi:10.1093/biomet/57.1.97] and Acceptance Ratio Simulated Annealing [Kirkpatrick et al. (1983) doi:10.1126/science.220.4598.671, ern (1985) doi:10.1007/BF00940812] on multiple cores, and ii) Acceptance Ratio Replica Exchange Monte Carlo Optimisation. In each case, the system pseudo-temperature is dynamically adjusted such that the observed acceptance ratio is kept near to the desired (fixed or changing) acceptance ratio.
